name.full: Terprint AI - Cannabis Intelligence for Florida MMJ Patients

description.short: AI-powered cannabis strain intelligence with lab data, deals, and personalized recommendations for Florida medical marijuana patients.
description.full:
Terprint AI brings comprehensive cannabis intelligence directly into Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams.

üåø **Strain Database**
Search 5,000+ cannabis strains with lab-verified terpene and cannabinoid profiles. Get detailed information on effects, flavors, and medical applications.

üíä **Personalized Recommendations**
Receive AI-powered strain suggestions based on your desired effects, symptoms, or activities. Our recommendation engine matches you with the perfect strain.

üí∞ **Real-Time Deal Finder**
Compare prices across all Florida dispensaries in real-time. Never overpay - find the best deals on flower, concentrates, edibles, and more.

üìç **Dispensary Locator**
Find nearby Medical Marijuana Treatment Centers (MMTCs) with directions, hours, and current inventory availability.

üî¨ **Lab Data Integration**
Access Certificate of Analysis (COA) data including THC/CBD percentages, terpene profiles, and testing results.

**Features:**
‚Ä¢ Natural language chat for cannabis questions
‚Ä¢ Strain comparison and analysis
‚Ä¢ Terpene education and effects
‚Ä¢ Florida MMUR compliance guidance
‚Ä¢ Personal favorites dashboard
‚Ä¢ Proactive deal notifications

**For Florida Medical Marijuana Patients**
Terprint AI is designed specifically for registered Florida medical marijuana patients seeking informed purchasing decisions. All data is sourced from licensed Florida dispensaries.

**Privacy First**
We never store personal health information. Your conversations and preferences remain private and secure.

commands.title: Search Strains
commands.description: Find and share cannabis strain information

parameters.name: query
parameters.title: Strain name or effect
parameters.description: Enter strain name, type (indica/sativa), or desired effect
